articles.headline: QB Chubba Purdy chooses to transfer to Nebraska after leaving Florida State football program

images.name: Lyn-j Dixon [608x342]
images.caption: Lyn-J Dixon had 104 carries for 635 yards and six touchdowns with Clemson in 2019, but has totaled only 52 carries for 238 yards in two years since.

images.name: Kai-Leon Herbert [608x342]
images.caption: Senior Kai-Leon Herbert was the No. 99 prospect in the 2017 class. He opted out of the 2020 season and has mainly been a reserve for Miami.

articles.description: After four seasons at Northwestern, quarterback Hunter Johnson is transferring back to Clemson -- a rare transfer to Dabo Swinney's program.
articles.headline: Onetime Clemson football recruit QB Hunter Johnson transfers back to Tigers after career at Northwestern

article.description: Jah-Maine Martin ran for a career-high 299 yards including two long touchdown runs and North Carolina A&T scored 21 points in the fourth quarter in beating Charleston Southern 27-21 on Saturday night.
article.headline: Martin runs for 299 yards, 2 long TDs in NC A&T's 27-21 win
article.linkText: Martin runs for 299 yards, 2 long TDs in NC A&T's 27-21 win
article.story: CHARLESTON, S.C. -- Jah-Maine Martin ran for a career-high 299 yards including two long touchdown runs and North Carolina A&T scored 21 points in the fourth quarter in beating Charleston Southern 27-21 on Saturday night. Martin found a gap on the right side and broke tackles on his way to a 76-yard score that gave the Aggies (2-1) a 27-14 lead with 5 1/2 minutes to go. The Buccaneers scored with about 3 1/2 minutes left but Martin had runs of 13 and 33 yards to help FCS-ranked North Carolina A&T retain possession. Martin carried 25 times, including an 84-yard scoring run a minute into the fourth quarter with a 2-point conversion tying the game at 14. Noel Ruiz then added his third and fourth field goals of the night. Elijah Bell had 77 yards receiving for 2,347 for an Aggies career record, passing Herbert Harbison. Kameron Brown had 110 yards receiving on nine catches, including two for touchdowns, for Charleston Southern (0-3).
